abstract: Maria Sharapova defeats Karolina Pliskova in Fed Cup tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova defeated Karolina Pliskova, 6-3, 6-4, to pull Russia into a 1-1 tie with Czech Republic, the defending champion, in the Fed Cup final.

headline.main: Russia Draws Even at Fed Cup
headline.print_headline: Russia Draws Even at Fed Cup

snippet: Maria Sharapova defeated Karolina Pliskova, 6-3, 6-4, to pull Russia into a 1-1 tie with Czech Republic, the defending champion, in the Fed Cup final.
